overview:
Looking for HR jobs in Gurgaon then visit Michael Page. Michael Page helps you to identify every kind of jobs you are looking for at every metro cities of India.

First established in London in 1976, Michael Page International is a leading professional recruitment consultancy specializing in the recruitment of permanent, contract and temporary positions on behalf of the worldâ€™s top employers including Credit Suisse, Bank Of America, Barclays, Cadbury and many more. On their website you can browse through the latest banking jobs in India, finance jobs in India, hr jobs in Delhi, IT jobs in Pune, Bangalore, advertising and marketing jobs in Mumbai and many others that suit perfectly to your profile.

They operate through 161 offices in 33 countries worldwide, including India and have been bringing job seekers and employers together for more than 30 years.
